info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 7:47AM CDT by NWS Louisville KY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...
Green River at Woodbury affecting Warren and Butler Counties.
Green River at Rochester affecting Ohio, Butler and Muhlenberg Counties.
.Heavy rain from the past 24 hours will cause the river to rise.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Green River at Rochester.
* WHEN...From this evening until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. At 44.0 feet, KY 1117 floods near Mining City. At 45.0 feet, KY 70 floods between Dunbar and South Hill. Water enters basements in some homes along river in Rochester.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 34.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 34.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to a crest of 44.9 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 44.4 feet on 02/28/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk.
The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 200 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Butler, KY; Muhlenberg, KY; Ohio, KY
